text: It seems there has been a man of reckless instincts who has eaten a woman's breasts, like eating oranges without chewing them or dividing them into guys, but biting and sucking them. Maybe breasts eaten with the courageous appetite that could make that act, you know, frog thighs or something. What about your nipple? Your nipple must know like the toasted nipple of bread that ends up on a tip, on an exquisite tip. It also seems that some breasts must know how to goyaba. FIN
title: El que se los comió
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
